attributes.title: terrible
attributes.review: this app is terribly terrible. i had decided to get it for my loving husband billy bob and when he opened up the app it said he had to sacrifice his soul to be able to use the app. my husband billy bob accepted it and next thing you know, his soul is being sucked right outta him !! the family skunk watched in terror as billy bob was suspended in the air, eyes rolled all the way back, while his literal SOUL was being SNATCHED. the skunk was so scared in fact it sprayed billy bob. we had to run to the store to get tomato sauce to throw it on billy bob while he was suspended in the air. about 3 hours later billy bob finally fell down. he will never be the same again ğŸ’” my poor billy bob is lifeless as iâ€™m writing this right now. 1/10 would not try again

attributes.title: Disgrace
